sub_title: Project Manager, Community Manager, Audio & Video Producer
summary:
Team leader and Service Delivery Manager in IT Service Desk Outsourcing for different Austrian companies ranging from medium sized local companies to large international corporations. Experience with ITIL compliant service organisations. 

Experienced volunteer community manager of various online communities (gaming and non-gaming). As well as various forms of online and social media marketing including Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Wordpress and Youtube.

Fluent in German, English and Dutch. Searching for a job as community or social media manager
